modName: Crimson Guard Armor - Stormcloaks - Modders Resource
summary: A retextured version of the Stormcloak armor. Turns the normal blue color into into a deep red.
descriptionHtml:
I had planned to use this mesh in a mod involving Vampires and Whiterun (you\'ll see the textures are in a folder called Whiterun Vampires), but I\'m putting that on hold for the moment. So since I won\'t be using these any time soon, I decided to upload them so that someone else may find a use for them in their own mod. The textures are good quality (I was very meticulous about making them).

This has meshes for 3 different items:
-Main Armor, the cuirass and greaves (Male, Female, and World Model)
-Helmet (Male, Female, and World Model)
-Shield (Biped model and World Model)
Note: the Shield is still buggy; the emblem hangs off the side of the shield, but I plan to fix this in future versions (that is why it is version .9 and not 1.0)

Feel free to use these in your own mods that you publish, but please remember to give credit to me for them. I also would appreciate being told when you use them; I\'d like to see how they are put to good use. :)
author: Penguinchao
